text: I've added the bug spreadsheet as a bookmark to this channel. This is an annotated list of bugs to help keep track of bugs that may be suitable for contributors with different levels/types of expertise. It only covers ~10% of open bugs, so feel free to update/add bugs as you look at bug reports on Bugzilla. Part of the idea is to avoid many people re-reading the same bug report just to come to the conclusion that it's not a good bug for external contributors! Hopefully this helps you or others find a good bug to work on.
